tool_description: Generates comprehensive analytics and reports on appointment scheduling patterns, provider utilization, patient flow, and operational efficiency metrics.

report_type.description: Type of report: utilization, patient_flow, cancellation_analysis, wait_times, provider_performance, revenue_impact

provider_ids.description: Specific providers to include in analysis

include_weekends.description: Whether to include weekends in analysis

grouping.description: How to group results: daily, weekly, monthly

error_messages: Invalid report_type: Must be one of [utilization, patient_flow, cancellation_analysis, wait_times, provider_performance, revenue_impact]
Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date and range cannot exceed 2 years
Provider not found: One or more specified provider_ids do not exist
Invalid grouping: Grouping must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
Invalid export_format: Format must be one of [json, csv, summary]
Insufficient data: Not enough data available for the specified date range and parameters
usage: Specify report_type and date range. Optionally filter by specific providers and customize grouping and output format. The tool generates detailed analytics reports.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated report

total_appointments.description: Total number of appointments in the analysis period

key_metrics.description: List of key performance metrics and their values

recommendations.description: Automated recommendations based on analysis results

report_summary.description: Executive summary of findings and insights
